perturbation.original_text: This Global Master Supply Agreement ("Agreement" or "Contract") is between ExxonMobil Chemical Company, a division of Exxon Mobil Corporation ("Seller"),on behalf of itself and in the interest of the ExxonMobil affiliates listed on Attachment B (each an "ExxonMobil Selling Affiliate" or "EMCC/A" or collectively, "ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates"), and West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. ("Buyer"), on behalf of itself and the Buyer affiliates listed on Attachment C (each a "Buyer Affiliate" or "West/A" or collectively, "Buyer Affiliates").
perturbation.changed_text: This Global Master Supply Agreement ("Arrangement" or "Contract") is between ExxonMobil Chemical Company, a division of Exxon Mobil Corporation ("Vendor"),on behalf of itself and in the interest of the ExxonMobil affiliates listed on Attachment B (each an "ExxonMobil Selling Affiliate" or "EMCC/A" or collectively, "ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates"), and West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. ("Client"), on behalf of itself and the Buyer affiliates listed on Attachment C (each a "Buyer Affiliate" or "West/A" or collectively, "Buyer Affiliates").
perturbation.explanation: The terms "Agreement" and "Arrangement", and the terms "Seller" and "Vendor", and the terms "Buyer" and "Client" are used interchangeably without clarifying if they refer to the same thing. This creates confusion and uncertainty regarding the obligations for each.

perturbation.original_text: In accordance with the provisions of this Agreement, ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates agree to sell to Buyer Affiliates, and Buyer Affiliates agree to purchase from ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates, the following product(s) (collectively, "Product"): Products Quantity [Metric Tons / Year] Container PackageYear 2019 2020 2021 2022 2023 [*****] [*****] Minimum Maximum [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] Leased metal crates [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] Leased metal crates [*****] not defined Leased metal crates Subject to this Agreement's terms and conditions, Buyer Affiliates shall purchase and ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates shall sell the yearly minimum amount of Product amounts (in the aggregate) listed above.
perturbation.changed_text: In accordance with the provisions of this Arrangement, ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates agree to sell to Buyer Affiliates, and Buyer Affiliates agree to obtain from ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates, the following item(s) (collectively, "Goods"): Goods Quantity [Metric Tons / Year] Container PackageYear 2019 2020 2021 2022 2023 [*****] [*****] Minimum Maximum [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] Leased metal crates [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] [*****] Leased metal crates [*****] not defined Leased metal crates Subject to this Arrangement's terms and conditions, Buyer Affiliates shall obtain and ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates shall sell the yearly minimum amount of Goods amounts (in the aggregate) listed above.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Agreement' has been replaced with 'Arrangement', 'purchase' has been replaced with 'obtain' and 'Product' has been replaced with 'Goods'. It's not clear if the term 'Arrangement' is referring to this specific 'Contract' or a broader understanding between the parties. Similarly, it's not clear if 'Goods' is a reference to 'Product' mentioned earlier in the text.

perturbation.original_text: Product shall conform to ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates' standard sales specifications as of the date of shipment. Sellers agrees to support the creation of purchasing specifications for Products by Buyer and agrees to supply Products in accordance to those purchasing specifications.
perturbation.changed_text: Commodities shall conform to ExxonMobil Selling Affiliates' standard sales specifications as of the date of shipment. Vendors agrees to support the creation of purchasing specifications for Deliverables by Client and agrees to supply Deliverables in accordance to those purchasing specifications.
perturbation.explanation: Here, Product is interchanged with Commodities and Deliverables, further introducing ambiguity. It is not defined whether Commodities and Deliverables are the same as Product. This creates uncertainty regarding the precise items that must meet the specified standards. Also, the term Seller has been replaced with Vendor and Buyer with Client. This adds more ambiguity to who agrees to do what.
